name: Hey Beauty: Love & Puzzle
description:
Are you a beauty lover? Addicted to romantic love? Dreaming for a "do-over" in life? YES! Play Beauty Evolution: Love & Choices, a match 3 puzzle game that has so much to offer. Watch out. Your life is gonna take a big turn!
"I'm a single mother, so what?"
When Julia catches her husband cheating on her, she's devastated. Help Julia start all over again with her child, take her on a new path, and find her true beauty. Wait, what? Her first love is back and wants to meet her...
Life is not just waiting for someone who is made for you. Take the initiative, make choices, and decide your own fate!
Start your Beauty Evolution today!




SUBSCRIBE TO Hey Beauty: Love & Puzzle
Subscribe to Hey Beauty for all of the following benefits:
- Fantasy Pass
- Free Rewards Daily
- Extra 5 Lives
SUBSCRIPTIONS INFORMATION:
Hey Beauty: Love & Puzzle VIP Membership access offers membership options:
1) A monthly subscription costing $9.99 per month.
This is an auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your account after confirmation. The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the period ends. Your account will also be charged for renewal
End of subscription renewal:
-The payment is charged to your iTunes account after a confirmation of purchase
-The subscription is renewed unless you unsubscribe 24 hours before the end of the current period
-The account will be charged for renewal 24 hours before the end of the current period at the standard cost of the monthly subscription
-The user may manage the subscription and auto-renewal by accessing the user's account settings after purchase in the store
-No cancellation of the current subscription is permitted during the active subscription period
